srs.label: SRS (Spaced Repetition)
srs.description: Automatically selects cards based on review timing
srs.detail: Reviews at optimal intervals based on memory curve. Rated Again/Hard/Good/Easy to adjust intervals. Wrong cards reappear within the same session.

sequential_review.label: Sequential Review
sequential_review.description: All new cards + review cards in order
sequential_review.detail: All new cards are always included. Batch size controls how many existing cards to review. Cycles back to the beginning after reaching the end.

random.label: Random
random.detail: Randomly draws cards up to batch size from the deck. All non-suspended cards are eligible regardless of SRS status.

sequential.label: Sequential
sequential.detail: Studies cards in sort order up to batch size. Remembers your position and continues from where you left off. Wraps around after reaching the end.

by_date.label: By Date
by_date.description: Study cards uploaded on a specific date
by_date.detail: Collects and studies only cards added on the selected date. Useful for quickly reviewing newly added cards.

cramming.label: Cramming Mode
cramming.detail: Cycle all cards round by round. Missed cards repeat until mastered. No impact on SRS schedule.

quickStudy.title: Quick Study
quickStudy.noDecks: No decks. Please create a deck first.
quickStudy.batchSizeDescReview: Review cards per session — all new cards included ({{min}}~{{max}})
